verses.roman:
āmāra hṛdaya haite gelā tomāra hṛdaye
hena bujhi, janmibena kona mahāśaye

synonyms: āmāra hṛdaya haite—from my heart; gelā—transferred; tomāra hṛdaye—into your heart; hena—like this; bujhi—I understand; janmibena—will take birth; kona—some; mahāśaye—very great personality.
translation: "From my heart it entered your heart. I therefore understand that a great personality will soon take birth."
